title: Minecraft Twilight Forest Mod: How to Make a Portal (2024)

steps.title: Create a 2x2 hole.
steps.content: Create a 2x2 hole. It must be surrounded by Dirt, Coarse Dirt, Grass, Podzol, or Mycelium blocks to work. This hole can be made in any biome, day or night. [1] X Research source Twilight Forest Portals are only available with the Twilight Forest mod on Minecraft: Java Edition. This won't work on regular Minecraft .

steps.title: Fill the hole with a water source.
steps.content: Fill the hole with a water source. You can make the portal over any type of block, but there must be blocks underneath the water source blocks.

steps.title: Place flowers or mushrooms around the hole.
steps.content: Place flowers or mushrooms around the hole. Every block on the edge of the hole must have either to work.

steps.title: Throw a diamond in the hole.
steps.content: Throw a diamond in the hole. This will make lightning strike the water and turn it into a Twilight Forest Portal. If it doesn't work, make sure the day and night cycle is active. You can use the command /gamerule doDaylightCycle true to make sure it's turned on. If you have the Embers Rekindled mod installed , you'll need to throw in a Glimmer Crystal instead of a diamond.
